bug.author: sotetsuk
bug.summary: [Feedback v0.12.0] "View full log" for stdout does not work
bug.description:
Click "View full log" for stdout in each task does not work. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5868442/56803769-27758480-6856-11e9-8f65-d60322679bf6.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5868442/56803759-1af12c00-6856-11e9-9bb6-58207b5d5efa.png></denchmark-link>
For stderr, it's working

comments.comment: I have tested it. Seems stdout button redirect to a wrong address, to workaround it, you could leverage pylon to redirect, please visit master_ip:80 instead of master_ip:9286.
